name: GrimTide: Post jam version
description:
Inspired by retro games such as minesweeper and missile command, as well as more modern titles like Creeper world and Factorio.

A tide of red stuff is creeping towards your base. How long can you hold off it’s unstoppable advance.

Build factories on purple squares to generate resources.

  • Use proximity mines protect your factories, and mortars to clear out the red stuff.
  • Prevent the red from creating new sources by shooting it’s spores out the air with missiles.
  • And if the worst come to worst, you always have the nukes.

Completed in 3 days for Ludum Dare 50 and updated April 2023.
